lender.name: Victoria
lender.loan_because: Economic growth creates peace and stability for everyone.
lender.occupational_info: I raise money for a microlending institution in the United States.

lender.name: Dr. Peter Copp
lender.loan_because: Money is contraband. (Jimmy Buffet)
lender.occupational_info: We help others improve and maitain their quality of life by improving and maintaining a vital part of themselves - their mouths. Since many are anxious about dental treatment, we are also trained in General Anaesthesia so patients can sleep while we care for them.

lender.name: Maureen
lender.loan_because: it is a very minor, simple thing to do that can make a difference to someone in need.
lender.occupational_info: educate and assist middle school children.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because:
Proverbs 19:17 - If you help the poor, you are lending to the Lord—and he will repay you!

Proverbs 28:27 - Whoever gives to the poor will lack nothing, but those who close their eyes to poverty will be cursed.

Proverbs 31:8-9 -Speak up for those who cannot speak for themselves, for the rights of all who are destitute. Speak up and judge fairly; defend the rights of the poor and needy.

Matthew 25:40 - Then the King will say, 'I'm telling the solemn truth: Whenever you did one of these things to someone overlooked or ignored, that was me—you did it to me.'
lender.occupational_info: I am a neonatologist. I take care of babies who are born too early, babies born with birth defects, and babies who are very sick and need intensive care to keep them alive.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Alexis
lender.loan_because: it's cool to help, in a small way, somebody else succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I work to improve the health care system in the United States

lender.name: Stacy
lender.loan_because: God has provided me all I need. I am more than happy to give. God's love is to be shared!
lender.occupational_info: I breed dairy goats for sale to small farms and individuals. I specialize in the Nigerian Dwarf goat, a descendant of the West African Dwarf goat.

lender.name: Mary
lender.occupational_info: I'm a graduate student and work part-time as a research assistant and child advocate.

lender.name: Bryan & Julie
lender.loan_because: I am a small buiness owner and fortunately I was lucky enough to have help starting my business. So, I am passing that help along.
lender.occupational_info: I work in natural healthcare, using my hands to maintain mobility in the spine.

lender.name: Frank
lender.occupational_info: I work in manufacturing for Procter & Gamble.

lender.name: Tamyla
lender.loan_because: God tells me to.
lender.occupational_info: Keeping the children safe and healthy.

lender.name: Preston and Dominique
lender.loan_because: the loans benefit not just the individual, but entire communities.
lender.occupational_info: I buy and resell bicycle parts to bike shops. She does graphic design and oil painting.

lender.name: Bob & Sharon
lender.loan_because: This is an opportunity to share God's blessings with those who seek to improve the lives of their families and communities.
lender.occupational_info: We are retired American Soldiers who are now starting a small farm.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: I can\'t think of a way I could make more of a difference with $25
lender.occupational_info: I help sawmills learn how to get the same amount of lumber while using fewer trees.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: It's the best way to make maximum impact with my charitable dollars & help fellow entrepreneurs across the world.
lender.occupational_info: Independent artist/designer supplying graphic services for web, print & point of purchase industry.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: I can!

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I am a very lucky guy. In 2006 my first daughter was born (Kaelyn). I believe that everyone deserves the chance to excel no matter where they live. I hope my small part will help bring success to atleast one eager individual.
lender.occupational_info: I am the Vice President of a Self Storage company. It is a business that rents out small to medium size garage-like rooms to individuals and businesses that have a surpluss of stuff. We have 109 locations and we are independently owned and operated.

lender.name: BirthCare HealthCare
lender.loan_because: Loaning through Kiva is one way for our group of Certifed Nurse Midwives to help woman all over the world - not just in our community.
lender.occupational_info: We provide health care for woman. Teaching them about their bodies and empowering them to live a healthy life. Assisting woman with their pregnancy and being there to help them bring new life into the world.

lender.name: Benjamin
lender.loan_because: I am grateful for the comfortable life I have in the U.S. and wish the same for others. I also want people in other countries to know that Americans and Jews (I am both) want peace and prosperity for everyone.
lender.occupational_info: I am a doctor in an emergency department at a hospital.

lender.name: Tien
lender.loan_because: I know how hard it is for small businesses out there. We all don't have the resources to expand and thrive so a little help can go a long way. We are all in this together.
lender.occupational_info: I sell baked goods.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: Everyone should have the chance to expand their business and provde for their family.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student at a major university in the United States.

lender.name: Pat
lender.loan_because: For whom much is given, much is expected.

lender.name: Arnab
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: gabriella
lender.loan_because: I believe I must help others less lucky than me

lender.name: Andrea and Family
lender.loan_because:
I believe that culture's dialog and interaction are the sole weapon for peacekeeping.
All our children should aim for an equal world based on EQUAL lifestile opportunity.
Everibody should demonstrate that often common people's points of view, are not in accordance with governement's administrators, who usually have better choices.
TAKE YOUR CHANCE AND LOAN A DREAM!

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because: I have visited developing countries and enjoy Kiva as a way to help entrepreneurs get a start. A great idea.
lender.occupational_info: Doing the best I can with what I have to work with. Website is my day job.

lender.name: Nicolas
lender.loan_because: It\'s the normal way the world should fonctionate: if someone needs something I have and if I don\'t need it at the same time, I lend it.
lender.occupational_info:
Actually I work in a small company dealing with catchment areas management, agronomy, soil science, erosion and ecological problems.
We could be part of team to realize some projects (landscape, urbanization...) or doing impact studies. In this case one part of the job is making diagnosis, the other proposals. 
Nice to learn many things.

But if you prefer to speak about beekeeping or to speak german I'm here!!

lender.name: Annette
lender.loan_because: poor people deserve a chance.
lender.occupational_info: haitifriends.com

lender.name: Joshua
lender.loan_because: I have a lot of respect for the courage it takes to start and/or run a small business.
lender.occupational_info: Buying IT equipment

lender.name: Jeremiah and Brooke
lender.loan_because: God desires it.

lender.name: carlisles
lender.loan_because: We loan because it makes us feel good to participate in the world in a positive way.
lender.occupational_info: My husband writes programs for computers and I make and teach sculpture.

lender.name: Kd
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: puoti.fi
lender.loan_because: I am an entrepreneur myself and I believe lending to businesses in developing countries is more motivating for the receiver than direct aid.
lender.occupational_info: IT-professional / online retail. We sell lots of fair trade t-shirts at BoutikBoutik.com & Puoti.fi

lender.name: Joseph
lender.loan_because: Like to see this work for people who want to help themselves

lender.name: patrick
lender.loan_because: To those that much has been given, much is expected

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: it's such a good investment.

lender.name: Kristina
lender.loan_because: i want to give back to society in a way that helps future generations have the same opportunities i had growing up.
lender.occupational_info: i'm a researcher at a real estate investment management firm. i'm interested in the built environment and how it shapes community development.

lender.name: Bruce & Mary Kay
lender.occupation: We are both retired after raising 9 children.
lender.loan_because: We have a substantial life of retirement. We have always helped those whose need is greater than ours. Power is not in our hands, only small gifts. Micro lending is a gift that can be given over and over.
lender.occupational_info: My retired life has been and is spent in the finding of my family. Where did we come from? Who were these people that came from a country where indenture was a way of life?

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: As a Christian I have found that God is growing a passion within me to partner with initiatives like Kiva. I believe that the alleviation of poverty through wealth redistribution should be a priority for every follower of Christ.
lender.occupational_info: I am a pastor who works primarily with students and young adults. I'm passionate about learning what it means to follow the teachings and example of Jesus, and help others participate in that journey.

lender.name: Liza
lender.loan_because: I've travelled to a lot of these places and I realize how lucky I've been. Everyone deserves a chance.
lender.occupational_info: I work part time in the advertising department at a local newspaper.

lender.name: Kurt
lender.loan_because: Why not? It's a great way to spread wealth to where it's needed. It's fun. It's rewarding. It's a good thing to do. It's interesting.

lender.name: dminmem
lender.occupational_info: I create and design advertising for print, broadcast and web.

lender.name: Meghan and Chad
lender.loan_because: Instead of making a purchase for Christmas each year for my parents, I give a loan in their name. They have so little need compared to many in the world, and will appreciate seeing my money going to a project such as this instead.
lender.occupational_info: I attend UW graduate school for Public Health Nutrition, and plan to work in dietetics and health policy.

lender.name: Marco
lender.loan_because: Micro is better! :)
lender.occupational_info: I develop databases and applications running on web sites. I love astronomy and trekking.

lender.name: Suzanne
lender.loan_because: The loan is in my grandchildren\'s--Dalton, Jacob, David, and Claire-- interest to focus attention on others\' needs and so that they may observe the effect of micro lending for an individual building a business.

lender.name: Ryan and Lindsay
lender.loan_because: sometimes the first obstacle is the biggest.
lender.occupational_info: she is in school and he runs a small business, and they are both just trying to do good.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: I enjoy watching people start and succeed at running their own company.
lender.occupational_info: I provide Broadband and IT Solutions to Businesses.

lender.name: Boxer
lender.loan_because: The gift has been given, in His name we are to share.\r\nGod Bless Us Everyone\r\n

lender.name: Lori & Andy
lender.loan_because: A lot of people have done a lot for us and we believe in retuning the favor. Although we\'re critical of many microcredit and microfinance programs, we wanted to give Kiva a try because it links people in a much more personal way.
lender.occupational_info: (About us) Lori is currently in graduate school earning two masters degrees. She was a Peace Corps Volunteer in Africa and a teacher in Asia, and continues to do public health work internationally. Andy is a manager of a major book store.

lender.name: zach
lender.occupational_info: I print magazines, and play music in a rock band.

lender.name: Katya
lender.loan_because: I'd like to give back in a productive way.
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher

lender.name: Joanne
lender.loan_because: It is putting assets directly into the hands of the people who need it.
lender.occupational_info: My work involves investing money for clients. My life involves my husband and three sons, extended family, traveling, writing, my sport, and cooking.

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: I can!

lender.name: Gaylan
lender.loan_because: All the people of the world should have an opportunity to invest in their own future, and have the dignity of providing for themselves and their families. Microfinancing encourages the business owner by empowering them to seize such opportunities.
lender.occupational_info: As a seminary professor, I help to prepare workers for the church of Jesus Christ by equipping them in knowledge of the Bible, of themselves, and of the world around them.

lender.name: LyAnna
lender.loan_because: "For unto whomsoever much is given, of him shall be much required."

lender.name: Connie O.
lender.loan_because: I really believe in the idea that microlenders can help people improve their situations in places where banks just will not take a chance, especially when you see the success rate of all these businesses that allows almost all of them to pay back the investments in full. It is an amazing success story.
lender.occupational_info: Most recent work was hardware design, specifically use of programs (simulators) to check whether hardware would work right even before it was built.

lender.name: Ben & Beth
lender.loan_because: Our giving is renewable this way. Instead of just giving money, each time we give money and get it back we can re-lend it.
lender.occupational_info: Beth is a Kindergarten teacher and works with 4-6 year olds. Ben works at a distillery and watches their daughter during the week.

lender.name: Brian and Candy
lender.loan_because: We've been to some areas of the world like this and it's absolutely remarkable how far a few bucks will go.

lender.name: Donna
lender.loan_because: My family emigrated to America from Lithuania prior to World War II. They received a lot of help from the community, and managed to have good lives. I\'d like to repay the kindness shown to my family by giving a helping hand to others.
lender.occupational_info: I have my own business providing accounting services to new companies. I really enjoy working with entrepeneurs and helping them to create a strong foundation for managing their businesses.

lender.name: Leonard
lender.loan_because: at one point I needed a small loan to get started and I got help.

lender.name: Desira
lender.loan_because: Void

lender.name: Karla
lender.loan_because: I own a small business and I know how a little bit of help can make a big difference.
lender.occupational_info: I help parents listen to each other about what their children need.

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: I feel that Kiva gives more of the money I loan directly to the people who need it. If everyone in richer countries loaned small amounts to people in poorer countries no one would be poor anymore.
lender.occupational_info: I have to drive my small car for 30 minutes every morning to get to my office in a Canadian Government building.

lender.name: Kzinti
lender.loan_because: We are becoming one world community. It was through hard work and the kindness of many people that I have achieved what I have. Now it is my turn to be able to help others achieve their goals and dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers and robots in a manufacturing facility.

lender.name: Girls Incorporated
lender.loan_because: We are an edcucation and advocacy group for girls 5 to 18 years old of all economic background. We are using Kiva in cooperation with our Economic Literacy program.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.occupation: Co-owner of Lunaroma, and Software Programmer
lender.loan_because: Small businesses are the most important things to develop and support in our economy today. They support communities, and help people to create their own prosperity.
lender.occupational_info: My wife and I run an aromatherapy business that hand-crafts hundreds of bath and body care products, perfumes and much more. We use only 100% natural ingredients, mostly organic and/or wild-crafted

lender.name: AburukuwaA
lender.loan_because: The gift has been given, in His name we are to share.\r\nGod Bless Us Everyone\r\n

lender.name: edward
lender.loan_because: I have been given the chance to help others and I want to live up to the opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: I lead a group of Christians as their pastor. I teach the bible, share life with them, and we try to make a difference in the lives of those around.

lender.name: Robin
lender.loan_because: I want to help making poverty history. I guess i'm a bit of an idealist there.
lender.occupational_info: When our customers and their computers don't want to co-operate, i help, or i find somebody who does. It's a constant exploration between people, the work they do and the technology they (must) use to do it.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: I want to do my part to assist people who are willing to work to improve their economic situation.
lender.occupational_info: Insurance Sales

lender.name: Tom & Nancy
lender.loan_because: Everybody needs help sometime (and we got help when we needed it)

lender.name: Dawn
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping women entrepreneurs who need a little help to achieve their dreams.

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: I want to help people make a difference to their own lives and the lives of their families.
lender.occupational_info: At the moment, I'm studying constitutional law. I am interested in the way legal structures make a difference to people's lives. But sometimes abstract legal concepts feel very far removed from the reality of everyday experience, which is where Kiva operates. I think it's helpful to be reminded of life outside ivory towers on a regular basis.

lender.name: ateeq
lender.loan_because: i am
lender.occupational_info: i am a socialist focused on investing in women who can make a living in a capitalist world to improve their quality of life.

lender.name: Stratocaster
lender.loan_because: The gift has been given, in His name we are to share.\r\nGod Bless Us Everyone\r\n

lender.name: Max
lender.loan_because: It is my responsibility.
lender.occupational_info: I run a youth organization that provides after-school programs to 300 students.

lender.name: Pumpkin
lender.loan_because: The gift has been given, in His name we are to share.\r\nGod Bless Us Everyone\r\n

lender.name: Lauren
lender.loan_because: I want people to have the opportunity to make things better for themselves and their community.
lender.occupational_info: Teaching children how to read, write, and succeed in the classroom.

lender.name: Dabney
lender.loan_because: to whom much is given much is required

lender.name: Suzanne
lender.loan_because: I too went through hard times. The kindness of strangers helped restore my faith in myself and the belief that we are all meant to work for the common good.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a non-profit serving the elderly poor. My job is to wade through the government and insurance red tape to collect money for the services we provide. Sounds like fun huh?

lender.name: Steven
lender.loan_because: I believe it helps them become self sustaining. It teaches them to not only learn to fish, but how to own the pond.
lender.occupational_info: I manage an automobile dealership. I help do anything the business needs, from financing, to selling, to working on cars, etc.

lender.name: donna
lender.loan_because: It feels good to be able to help people who are trying to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Retired from being a horse doctor for 20 years; now raising two young sons

lender.name: Conner
lender.loan_because: i like the idea of helping people who are less fortunate than me and this is such an easy way to do it. a little goes a long way to these people and if my loan helps thats cool with me
lender.occupational_info: im an 8th grade student and i work on school stuff and i love to ski

lender.name: Ethan & Leah
lender.loan_because: trees grow from seeds and because we can
lender.occupational_info: Manage construction projects

lender.name: John
lender.occupational_info: My team builds computer software that puts music and video on computers and mobile phones. My role is to make it easier for everyone else on the team to do their best work.

lender.name: Cheryl and Ken
lender.loan_because: It is one of the most beautiful compensations of this life that no man can sincerely try to help another without helping himself. . . . Ralph Waldo Emerson -

lender.name: Donna
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping people to make their lives better.
lender.occupational_info: I have always worked in schools, at first teaching English and Social Studies and then as a school principal.

lender.name: Semyon
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference
lender.occupational_info: I help small companies get off the ground

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: I admire the applicants entrepreneurial spirit!

lender.name: Beth
lender.loan_because: Karma.

lender.name: Janelle
lender.loan_because: when the poorest is raised we are all raised.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: for $25 I can help save the world.

lender.name: ross
lender.loan_because: it offers the very highest of returns.
lender.occupational_info: I help businesses learn that if they are mindful of electricity they will be more successful

lender.name: Sandra
lender.loan_because: I believe that a handout does not profit the receiver that much. Granting them a loan that must be repaid, so they can work hard at growing their own business and supporting themselves is giving these people the tools to help themselves. Ultimately, that makes a stronger, more productive contributor to society.
lender.occupational_info: I am a full-time student, studying to become an accountant.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: It is a way to keep a gift alive for a very long time.
lender.occupational_info: My work is to express some energy shared by all of us through my medium, paint. I hope to be connected to this energy enough to have it relate to those who see the results.

lender.name: Sabrina
lender.occupation: speaker, writer, coach and health care researcher
lender.loan_because: I want to help those who work hard to help themselves. Reaching around the world to support them feels wonderful.
lender.occupational_info: I am a speaker, writer and coach at heart. I love helping individuals and communities explore and embrace positive change. Originally, I trained as a medical anthropologist. I'm keenly interested in health care reform, especially its impact on primary care and the urban "safety net". My book, "Surviving HIV/AIDS in the Inner City: How Resourceful Latinas Beat the Odds," was published by the Rutgers University Press in February 2011.

lender.name: Hernan
lender.loan_because: everybody deserves a chance

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: Everyone can use a little help and support.
lender.occupational_info: Automotive supplier

lender.name: Sergio
lender.loan_because: this is real lending and makes a quantifiable difference!
lender.occupational_info: i normally lend to borrowers who don't need the money as much!

lender.name: James & Dian
lender.loan_because: We want to see others get the chances we got.
lender.occupational_info: I sell imprinted products to large companies

lender.name: Dan, Theresa & Catie
lender.loan_because: We want to help improve the lives of families all over the world. Children deserve a home, food and a chance to go to school.
lender.occupational_info: We have a family business making metal parts for autos, airplanes, and many other products. Our business was started because our parents came from Argentina and got a loan to go into business. This is our way of helping others do the same.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: Every dollar we spend is a vote....overall, I believe how we spend our money is more important than the levers we pull every four years.......
lender.occupational_info: I work for state legislatures and others on education(school) distribution formulas and revenue structures....

lender.name: Samantha
lender.loan_because: I want to give people the chance to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I wire houses so people can have heat, lights and other electrical items.

lender.name: Raven
lender.loan_because: The spirits tell me to. They decide who gets it and who doesn\'t. I don\'t know why it\'s \"this one\" and not \"that one\", but I go along with it. I don\'t have very much money, but I can afford $25 once in a while.
lender.occupational_info: I am a shaman, and I do readings and spirit-work for clients. I also work a small farm with my wife - we have goats, sheep, poultry, and rabbits.

lender.name: Cheralynn
lender.loan_because: Kiva was a Christmas gift given to me by a friend. I love that I was given the gift to give! I am looking forward to seeing the journey this leads me on.
lender.occupational_info: I teach high school art.

lender.name: Thi
lender.loan_because: I give a drop and it could be an ocean for someone.
lender.occupational_info: I am an ESL teacher, and part of my work is to interact with many people from various social, economical and cultural backgrounds. Sometimes it feels like having a small united cosmos reaching out to me. In my work, I take journeys here and there without going anywhere far, and I can't ask for more.

lender.name: Kira
lender.loan_because: My husband and I have seen the power of microfinancing throughout our travels. We also realize how fortunate we are. We are blessed with good health, good jobs and a loving family. We\'d like to share some of this good fortune with others.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: small entrepreneurs are what make up the fabric of a healthy, free society.

lender.name: Dennis
lender.loan_because: I have traveled throughout Southeast Asia and Central America, and have seen first-hand people trying their best to use their entrepreneurial skills to help their families better their circumstances. So it gives me a real feeling of connection to see their photos and read their stories as I try to give them a hand up.
lender.occupational_info: I am an elementary math curriculum specialist, working for a non-profit in Oregon. I was a primary grades classroom teacher for 33 years prior to this job.

lender.name: LaRaia Family
lender.loan_because: Supporting others is the cornerstone of humanity.

lender.name: Gary and Lori Gregory
lender.occupational_info: I design and write software that allows businesses to communicate.

lender.name: Mike and Diana
lender.loan_because: It\'s the right thing to do. When you think that a small investment or several small investments, when repaid, can then be recycled to help others in a continuum...well, that\'s as good as it gets. It\'s a rate of return with meaning way beyond numbers.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: the best way to make the world a better place is to help people help themselves.

lender.name: Linda and Mark
lender.loan_because: We've been blessed with love, family and health, it's the least we can do! Trying to help the world one person at a time.

lender.name: Jeni Yang
lender.loan_because: we're all kind of in this together.
lender.occupational_info: I work with businesses to tackle issues and help them realize answers to questions that they didn't know they could already answer.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: Just a small amount of money can make a huge difference in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: Selling engineering software.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: believe in microfinancing and more then that because I believe in people. I want to see the US (and the world) walk out of their isolationist tendencies. The people I\'ve met and the places I\'ve seen (Due to couchsurfing.com and my own will) make me believe in reducing poverty one small step at a time, and by enabling and not dictating.
lender.occupational_info: I make computers work for a small quaker lobby organization in Washington DC.

lender.name: Jarrett
lender.loan_because: We have a responsibility to extend our priviledge and opportunity across humanity. For further information, I recommend reading John Rawls\' \"A Theory of Justice\".

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: An idea that is developed and put into action is more important than an idea that exists only as an idea. Buddha
lender.occupational_info: I strive for spiritual progress rather then spiritual perfection

lender.name: Damian
lender.loan_because: It's great to able to contribute and see where your money is going. The Frontline piece several years inspired me to start loaning to Kiva.
lender.occupational_info: I help manage higher education enrollment, recruitment and admissions processes.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: knowing I can help people improve their lives for themselves, their family, and their community. That's what being a citizen of the world is all about.
lender.occupational_info: I start nursing school in fall of 2011. I hope to become a neonatal or pediatric nurse.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: You must be the change you wish to see in the world. — Mahatma Gandhi

lender.name: Miguel
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of a small start to a large enterprise.
lender.occupational_info: I manage technologies and create computer systems for cancer research.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: b/c I have more money than I absolutely need, and other people don't.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the remote countryside, growing organic crops. And I work doing various construction and landscaping jobs for folks in my area.

lender.name: Milford High School
lender.loan_because: Sharing is caring
lender.occupational_info: We learn about Nobel Peace laureates and try to become agents of change for a better world because we are inspired by those peaceful heroes.

lender.name: debbie & ralph
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lender.name: Craig
lender.loan_because: I can and I would like to help. It's nice to know one person can help make someone else's life better in a very simple manner.
lender.occupational_info: I own a business now, just launching it in fact. It's nice to know I am helping other business people expand their enterprise.

lender.name: Ellen
lender.loan_because: it is so much fun to loan directly to women across the world from me. I don\'t have much money, but I can lend $25 at a time. Thank you Kiva, for helping me be able to make a small but meaningful contribution to the well being of another family. I am grateful.

lender.name: Athena
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs a leg up at some point. Helping others achieve their goals, dreams makes the world a better place for everyone.

lender.name: Cheryl
lender.loan_because: I love being able to help at such a grass roots level. It feels so personal.

lender.name: Sidney
lender.loan_because: I'm a very lucky and happy little girl, and I want other people around the world to be happy too. My parents want me to learn about helping others.
lender.occupational_info: I'm 5 years old and I like to share my things.

lender.name: Gonzo
lender.loan_because: Micro-lending is going to change the world.

lender.name: Rachael & Loren
lender.loan_because: it's tzedakah.
lender.occupational_info: I help the public find what they need for research, particularly on state history.

lender.name: Kenneth
lender.loan_because: it is the key to selfsufficiency for many disadvantaged people.
lender.occupational_info: I worked in landscape maintenance, gardening, and growing plants to sell for most of my working life. It is also my hobby.

lender.name: david
lender.loan_because: I can. I am in a very lucky position.
lender.occupational_info: I design/install subsea pipelines. At the moment I am working for a large oil and gas company. I have worked for many comanpies over the years ranging from people who build to people who design. Supposedly what I do is very specialised but a lot of it is common sense. Oil companys pay millions/billions of dollars to lay piplines under the sea so they want the right people to look after that investment. I am one of those people that looks after it from a technical point of view ie can we do this I would say yes/maybe or no.

lender.name: monts
lender.loan_because: i want to see the world change--if only a small portion at a time.
lender.occupational_info: pastor of a church in san francisco - http://ikonsf.com

lender.name: Nicolas Perot
lender.occupational_info: I raise and invest money for the development of my company, the French postal company.

lender.name: Sophie
lender.loan_because: Although I am only 26 months old,I would love to make the world a better place someday. I think everyone should have a chance to use their talents and be able to feel good about what they do. Kiva allows me and my parents to make a difference in people\'s lives.
lender.occupational_info: Toddler: Help my mom clean, draw scribbles with my crayons, help feed my cat Naomi, and generally make life wonderful for my parents Karine and Gavin

lender.name: Pat
lender.loan_because:
I saw the Frontline episode and thought it would a great way to help those in need all over the world.
Join Kansans for Kiva Lending Team!!!!
lender.occupational_info: I work with 5th to 8th grade students who have behavior disorders and learning disabilities.

lender.name: Sebastien
lender.loan_because: I am glad I can help entrepreneurs who are working hard to better their life and their family\'s.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Jessie
lender.loan_because: Reading the stories and seeing the pictures of the potential business owners makes me realize anything is possible if we only get out of bed in the morning...take a deep breath...and GO FOR IT! We all need to love and support each other in these positive endeavors.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a small architectural firm in the United States. I deal with a variety of personality types, and have a fairly creative position, which I really enjoy.

lender.name: Molly
lender.loan_because: I love the idea that a little extra from me can make a big difference to a person half way around the world.
lender.occupational_info: graphic design and art

lender.name: Gabriele
lender.loan_because: I think it may really help. I have some money \"in excess\" in present time, and I want not to waste it.
lender.occupational_info: I am a military medic of the Carabinieri. Carabinieri is sort of police in Italy, but military. Very tipical of Italy.

lender.name: Philip & Jess
lender.loan_because: The idea that a few dollars can change lives is a powerful one.
lender.occupational_info: I provide assistance to owners of rental housing for low income families and my wife teaches music.

lender.name: Doug & Susan
lender.loan_because: It's fun, it's needed
lender.occupational_info: Doug is the new drummer for a local country-rock band called The Ramblin Jaks. Susan writes songs and (to be continued)...

lender.name: Martha
lender.loan_because: I believe this is a far more direct way of helping people help themselves. I select projects that appear to be sustainable, and avoid those that may have harmful environmental impacts.
lender.occupational_info: Mostly I am a teacher, trying to help people understand environmental and conservation issues, and to feel more empowered to be involved at home and abroad.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: It is a way to make the world a happier place.
lender.occupational_info: I teach college students about Human Sexuality.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: I live in a wealthy country and although I am not wealthy I am very fortunate. Passing that on to someone else seems like a very responsible thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I would tell them that I work for an engineering firm.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: everyone should have the opportunity to achieve their dreams and provide for themselves, their families, and their community.
lender.occupational_info: I am an attorney representing public sector labor unions.

lender.name: Kate
lender.loan_because: i am extremely lucky to be living in a great country like Canada and want to share my good fortune with others.
lender.occupational_info: when someone has a car accident and is hurt i investigate the accident and decide who caused it and how much money the innocent party should receive to compensate them for their damages and injuries.

lender.name: Dave, Lillie & Kids
lender.loan_because: it works!

lender.name: Lizzie
lender.loan_because: it feels good.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a freelance writer and curator, and the author Detour: My Bipolar Road Trip in 4-D.

lender.name: Evan
lender.loan_because: I want to express my values in a clearly tangible way
lender.occupational_info: Teaching the power of the precise use of English language, which in turns aids individuals to be economically self-sufficient and morally munificent.

lender.name: John Stephanie Nona
lender.loan_because: we can help the world be a better place.
lender.occupational_info: We help businesses get their message out to their audience through creative solutions in design, print and web media.

lender.name: Marli
lender.loan_because: Others have helped me and I'm paying it forward.
lender.occupational_info: I help people gain more confidence in their ability to manage their money.

lender.name: Brad
lender.loan_because: I am blessed with opportunity as a \"birth rite\" while others have to fight, live in mind-numbing poverty, even go hungry on a daily basis. To these poeple, \"opportunity\" is more of a fantasy than it is a part of their everyday lives.
lender.occupational_info: I worked with computers and software for many years but I have traded them for a camera. I attempt to make images that bring a new perspective to the way we \"see\".

lender.name: Carmen & Scout
lender.loan_because: I know first hand the challenges of trying to start a business. Along with having a passion for what you do and the energy to support it, we all need a financial foundation. I absolutely love being able to help someone realize their dream.
lender.occupational_info:
In my profession, I gather information on people and companies that my customers are interested in doing business with or investing in. I try to determine whether the subjects I am researching are reputable, honest, and trustworthy. If they are not, my customer will likely do business with someone else. I am an investigator, also known as a detective.
I started my own business in March of this year (2007). I have had many struggles and it takes a LOT of hard work! But...it is sooooo worth it!
When I am not working, I am spending time with family, friends, and my dog "Scout." I love to play in the dirt and dream of having a nice garden some day, and maybe a chicken, a goat, and a cow. :-)
Peace. Love. Hugs.

lender.name: steve
lender.loan_because: If it really is true that we are all one then, shoot, there is a lot of me that could use a loan somewhere! Loaning with the possibility of getting the money back allows me to increase my charitable giving above and beyond donations.

lender.name: Kimberly
lender.loan_because: I want to give people the tools they need to better themselves, hoping that they will oneday give someone the same opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Masters Student of Landscape Architecture. When I am done with my schooling, I will design outdoor spaces, gardens, public spaces, parks, maybe even cities.

lender.name: Mark & Dianne
lender.loan_because: We have so much in this country. The small amount we give in conjunction with other Kiva lenders actually gives us a chance to make a difference in a life. Thanks Kiva for giving us this opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: We own and operate a family farm where Mark raises corn, soybeans and calves. Dianne teaches at a nearby university and does research at a private medical clinic.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: My friend Christina pointed this site out to me after her trip to India. I'm always interested in new ways to help people, and I've heard a lot about microcredit recently. I LOVE the idea of helping people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a nursing home that also has short term rehab facilities. I do the admission paperwork for all new residents & assist them & their families with whatever they need during their stay.

lender.name: Nadia
lender.occupational_info: I am studying journalism so I can help people\'s stories reach one another.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I want to help because I have been helped!

lender.name: Bruce, Miya & Taiyo
lender.loan_because: we want to help people achieve their goals.
lender.occupational_info: I make web sites for non-profits organizations

lender.name: Kyle
lender.loan_because: Micro-financing continues to prove itself as an effective and efficient investment for world development. It is helping many people gain access to capital and enjoy the possibility to create a better life for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student in Freiburg, Germany.

lender.name: Denis & Michèle
lender.loan_because: This is our way for helping other and make this world a better place, one person at the time.
lender.occupational_info: Both of us were aircraft mechanic but now we are retired and enjoying the good life

lender.name: greg
lender.occupational_info: I am a freelance writer specializing in religion and an adjunct professor of ethics, Bible, and comparative religion. My wife is a hair stylist.

lender.name: Veronique
lender.loan_because: Because I can so I should, and I love the stories! I also love the KIVA staff, all dedicated and energetic!
lender.occupational_info: I help children with learning disabilities. I translate for Kiva!

lender.name: Michel
lender.loan_because: it is my choice. I strongly believe in personal initiative and I want to support it wherever I can.
lender.occupational_info: I am a researcher, trying to describe the sea in such manners that engineers can build safer offshore structures and ships.

lender.name: Kay
lender.loan_because: I want to.
lender.occupational_info: Striving to make a difference, one person at a time.

lender.name: Graham
lender.loan_because: Kiva gift certificates make for fantastic presents.
lender.occupational_info: I make DVDs and design print material for businesses.

lender.name: Michael and Jamie
lender.loan_because: it enables people to help themselves.

lender.name: Kathy
lender.loan_because: I feel everyone needs to have a chance to excel. Pay it forward.
lender.occupational_info: Executive Assistant

lender.name: franksplanet
lender.loan_because: I want to reach out to my fellow residents of earth and let them know that we care for them and want them to have a better life for themselves, their family, and their community.

lender.name: William A.
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: Professor of Law and of Philosophy, Georgia State University, Atlanta, Georgia USA

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: My impact grows every time I loan again and again and again..........

lender.name: Leigh
lender.loan_because: I believe in giving people an opportunity to better themselves. Handouts only support dependency.
lender.occupational_info: I do \"the art of business\" -- websites, brochures, and all visual marketing.

lender.name: Debbie
lender.loan_because: I understand the impact that loaning has, building trust and enterprise with those who need it most.

lender.name: Ken Oatman
lender.loan_because: I'm an entrepreneur too! And I want to help other hard workers like myself.
lender.occupational_info: Solar electric power installer.

lender.name: joshua
lender.occupational_info: I work as a computer artist making Cartoon movies.

lender.name: JRHS Tigers
lender.loan_because: My students and I collect soft drink cans worth $0.05/ and sometimes beer bottles $0.10 each. We try to help the environment at the same time as send the small sums to those who need it.
lender.occupational_info: High School Science teacher

lender.name: June Hayes
lender.loan_because: I love what KIVA is doing, helping people help themselves and am honored to be part of this effort. Thanks to my son, David, for turning me on to KIVA! Namaste'

lender.name: Penny
lender.loan_because: I wanted to support entrepreneurs in other countries to become self sufficient, prosperous individuals. I truly believe that it does take a village to raise a child. And these dear people need our help.

lender.name: Netsanet
lender.loan_because: I believe in Self-Empowerment !!

lender.name: McCartney
lender.loan_because: I've been to rural africa and have seen what must be done.
lender.occupational_info: We train people to use maps

lender.name: MeltedSnow
lender.loan_because: I have been so lucky in my life to be surrounded by so many great people. I hope to give a peice of that good fortune to someone else so that they can have a better life as well.
lender.occupational_info: We are nomads, conservationist, students, baristas, activists, lab rats, cyclists, artists, lovers, construction workers, and educators.

lender.name: J,K, Aidan & Layton
lender.loan_because: We loan to help those that are helping themselves.

lender.name: Philip & Rachel
lender.loan_because: We believe in helping those who have the drive and ambition to help themselves.
